0.0.1.name: wordpress/jd-redesign-images
0.0.1.description:
Everytime a post or page is published, updated, edited, or shown on your website, JD redesignImages would check for two things: hotlinked and oversized images. For every image that meets the criteria, it applies the filters set above. and tags would then be updated to point to the new images saved in your uploads folder (images that are _suffixed according to your settings).

Optionally, fitters like grayscale, tint, blur and others may also be applied.
